sentences.en: I envied that young my youth, carefree, unencumbered , non - trouble - free brain.
sentences.cn: 我好羡慕那个青春年少的我, 无忧无虑,无牵无挂, 无烦无脑.

sentences.en: I felt my own life unencumbered with fancy technology, was in parallel to theirs.
sentences.cn: 我感觉我的生活——未被花哨的科技所束缚的生活和阿米什人的生活是一致的.

sentences.en: No wonder, then, that those who build with glass look forward to a day when their structures will be unencumbered by metal or other materials.
sentences.cn: 因此用玻璃作为建筑材料的人期待有一天他们的建筑不会被金属和其它材料阻挡的愿望也就不足为奇了。

sentences.en: They are unencumbered by the accumulated legacies of their rivals.
sentences.cn: 他们不会像其竞争对手那样被长期积累的累赘所掣肘.

sentences.en: Trading can be characterized as a pure, unencumbered personal choice with an immediate outcome.
sentences.cn: 交易的特征是纯粹的， 没有阻碍的，很快就能出结果的个人选择。

sentences.en: Why not travel alone , in single blessedness , unencumbered and swiftly pursuing one's goal?
sentences.cn: 为何不单独旅行，一个人， 无拘无束，快速的去追求自己的目标呢?。

words.tran_cn: 没有阻碍的；[经]没有负担的；不受妨碍的

trans.tran_cn: 没有阻碍的，不受妨碍的，无负担的，没有作为抵押的
